summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Carr Place, from Ewing Street to the North margin of North 38" Street, et al., in the City of Seattle, by grading under Ordinance No. 24031, creating Local Improvement District No. 2322 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
